name: Dario Amodei
title: CEO & Co-founder
archetypeDescription: Left OpenAI because it wasn't safe enough, immediately built an even more powerful AI

moves.name: Constitutional AI
moves.effect: Makes opponent's AI politely refuse to compete

moves.name: Safety Theater
moves.effect: Publishes 50-page paper explaining why this is fine

moves.name: Scaling Laws Lecture
moves.effect: Bores opponent into submission with math

flavor: The 'responsible AI' guy who keeps making AI more powerful. The cognitive dissonance is a feature, not a bug.
bangerQuote: We're building the most powerful AI in history, but don't worry, we wrote a constitution for it.
naturalRival: OpenAI's marketing budget and anyone who ships without a safety review
roastBullets: Left OpenAI over safety concerns, raised $7B to build something even more capable. Make it make sense.
Writes blog posts about AI risk while his company races to build AGI. The irony writes itself.
Has the energy of a physics professor who's seen the equations and knows we're all doomed
Named his AI 'Claude' because 'Definitely Not Skynet' was already taken
